name: DirtAttack2.0
description: DirtAttack2.0 is a two player game. Two players shooting at each other with a mountain in between to block some of the bullets. Player 1 uses the W and S keys for Up and Down, LeftCtrl key  for shooting.. while Player 2 uses the Up arrow and Down arrow key for Up and down, RightCtrl key to shoot. Press the R key to restart, Escape Key to pause/play, Ctrl Q to Quit the game.
